props.spellDuration: 1 round per force of the spell
props.spellRulestext:
Firestorm

This spell creates an area of swirling flame and fire equal to a radius of 4 m (2 ") per point of force. Anyone in the area takes 3 damage + net successes + Force in damage. This storm continues to rage in the meantime. Anyone entering or starting their turn in the storm takes 1d6 direct (fire) damage to their physical condition track.
